    Two bots in pods crashed in the ocean by Alliance Island.  The two pods=
 keep going down.  While going down, the DNA Scanners activate.  The first =
bot was a fuzor between a lobster and a sting ray.  The second bot also bec=
ame a fuzor, of a shark and a seagull.  Just before the two pods hit the oc=
ean floor, the two bots came came out from their pods.  They both transform=
ed to beast mode, and surfaced.  The second bot, who had seagull wings, fle=
w up from the ocean and was flying in the air.  The first bot came up too a=
nd swam to the shore of Alliance Island, and sat there.  The second bot fol=
lowed.

    "Finally," the first bot shouted, "We've made it to planet Eart=
h!  Let's find a good faction to join Anthrostite."

    "Yes, I agree, Pro=
tostite," replied Anthrostite.

    Anthrostite and Protostite figured that=
 this base here's faction would be good to join.  Anthrostite tried to send=
 a signal to get the Alliance's attention...



~Abyssian By Birth~
~Badass=
 By Choice~
